attributes.action: "stop" the insane perks that MP's claim. (this is asking the PM to do something).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should MP's get these perks, the working man does not get any thing like them so why should MP's, This "Must" be stopped at once.

rejection.details: Sorry, your petition is not clear - you can submit another one if you wish, but please spell out more clearly which "perks" you are referring to.  Your petition must have a point, clear details and be asking the PM for an action.  Thank you.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
